# Show Game

Returns json data about a single game.

  • URL

    /api/games/:id

  • Method:

    GET

  • URL Params

    Required:

    id=[integer]

  • Data Params

    None

  • Success Response:

    • Code: 200
      Content: {"id":2,"game_name":"Game Prueba","rating":7.44997,"id_owner":1,"entry_date":"2020-11-02 16:56:58","disponibility":true,"comments":""}

  • Error Response:

    • Code: 404 NOT FOUND
      Content: { error : "Game not found" }

  • Sample Call:

      $.ajax({
    url: "/users/1",
    dataType: "json",
    type : "GET",
    success : function(r) {
      console.log(r);
    }
  });

# Show Games

Returns json data about all games.

  • URL

    /api/games

  • Method:

    GET

  • URL Params

    None

  • Data Params

    None

  • Success Response:

    • Code: 200
      Content: [{"id":2,"game_name":"Game Prueba","rating":7.44997,"id_owner":1,"entry_date":"2020-11-02 16:56:58","disponibility":true,"comments":""}, ...

  • Error Response:

  • Sample Call:

      $.ajax({
    url: "/users/1",
    dataType: "json",
    type : "GET",
    success : function(r) {
      console.log(r);
    }
  });

# Insert Game

Inserts a new game.

  • URL

    /api/games

  • Method:

    POST

  • URL Params

    None

  • Data Params

    • Content: {"id":int,"game_name":string,"rating":float,"id_owner":int,"entry_date":string,"disponibility":bool,"comments":string}

  • Success Response:

    • Code: 200
      Content: [{"id":2,"game_name":"Game Prueba","rating":7.44997,"id_owner":1,"entry_date":"2020-11-02 16:56:58","disponibility":true,"comments":""}, ...

  • Error Response:

    • Code: 400
      Content: Error inserting game

  • Sample Call:

      $.ajax({
    url: "/users/1",
    dataType: "json",
    type : "GET",
    success : function(r) {
      console.log(r);
    }
  });

# Delete Game

Delete a game.

  • URL

    /api/games/:id

  • Method:

    DELETE

  • URL Params

    Required:

    id=[integer]

  • Data Params

    None

  • Success Response:

    • Code: 200
      Content: Game removed successfully

  • Error Response:

    • Code: 404
      Content: Error removing the game, might not exist

  • Sample Call:

      $.ajax({
    url: "/users/1",
    dataType: "json",
    type : "GET",
    success : function(r) {
      console.log(r);
    }
  });

# Update Game

Update an existing game.

  • URL

    /api/games/:id

  • Method:

    PUT

  • URL Params

    Required:

    id=[integer]

  • Data Params

    • Content: {"id":int,"game_name":string,"rating":float,"id_owner":int,"entry_date":string,"disponibility":bool,"comments":string}

  • Success Response:

    • Code: 200
      Content: {"id":2,"game_name":"Game Prueba 2","rating":7.44997,"id_owner":1,"entry_date":"2020-11-02 16:56:58","disponibility":true,"comments":""}

  • Error Response:

    • Code: 404
      Content: Game not found

  • Sample Call:

      $.ajax({
    url: "/users/1",
    dataType: "json",
    type : "GET",
    success : function(r) {
      console.log(r);
    }
  });
